Address.value: 1603 LYNDON B JOHNSON FREEWAY,SUITE 800, ONE HICKORY CENTRE, DALLAS, Texas, 75234, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: American Realty Investors Inc is a real estate company. The company acquires, develops, and owns income-producing residential and commercial real estate properties. Its segment involves Residential segment and Commercial segment. Residential segment is engaged in the acquisition, development, ownership, and management of multifamily properties and Commercial segment is engaged in the acquisition, ownership, and management of commercial real estate properties. Its holdings include apartments, office buildings, retail centers, and parcels of land.
